rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 16 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 12:10 AM, 27 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Bataan, Quezon, Nueva Ecija, Tarlac and Batangas within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Metro Manila(Caloocan, Valenzuela, Malabon, Navotas, Quezon City), Rizal(Rodriguez), Bulacan(Paombong, Hagonoy) and Pampanga(Floridablanca) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
